metadata.title: CVE-2017-14449 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
A double-Free vulnerability exists in the XCF image rendering functionalityof SDL2_image-2.0.2. A specially crafted XCF image can cause a Double-Freesituation to occur. An attacker can display a specially crafted image totrigger this vulnerability.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-14449` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsdl2-image-2.0-0 - 2.0.1+dfsg-2+deb9u1build0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libsdl2-image package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.0.1+dfsg-2+deb9u1build0.16.04.1').
